snippet: The government’s announcement that the police had arrested traders in eastern China brought to light one of the more alarming cases of tainted food in the country.
abstract: News of rat meat being sold as lamb in China highlights fears about country's food safety.
lead_paragraph: The government’s announcement that the police had arrested traders in eastern China brought to light one of the more alarming cases of tainted food in the country.

headline.seo: Rat Meat Sold as Lamb in China Highlights Fears
headline.main: Rat Meat Sold as Lamb Highlights Fear in China
headline.print_headline: Rat Meat Sold as Lamb Highlights Fear in China
